short_description: fastpath function to return parameters and target columns to be used by TD_RowNormalizeTransform for normalizing the input data.
long_description: fastpath function to return parameters and target columns to be used by TD_RowNormalizeTransform for normalizing the input data.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains input data.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains input data.

output_tables.name: OutputTable
output_tables.rDescription: Specifies the name of the table in which the output of TD_RowNormalizeFit can be stored.
output_tables.description: Specifies the name of the table in which the output of TD_RowNormalizeFit can be stored.

argument_clauses.name: TargetColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns that need to be normalized.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns that need to be normalized.

argument_clauses.name: Approach
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the method to use for row wise normalization. Default: UNITVECTOR.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the method to use for row wise normalization. Default: UNITVECTOR.

argument_clauses.name: BaseColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the base column to be used in INDEX approach formula.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the base column to be used in INDEX approach formula.

argument_clauses.name: BaseValue
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the base value to be used in INDEX approach formula.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the base value to be used in INDEX approach formula.
